query:
SELECT ar.id, ar.checklistKey, ar.status, ar.sendCount, ar.lastSentAt, 
       e.eventType, e.actorType, e.reason, e.createdAt as eventTime
FROM action_requests ar
LEFT JOIN action_request_events e ON ar.id = e.actionRequestId
WHERE ar.id = (SELECT id FROM action_requests ORDER BY createdAt DESC LIMIT 1)
ORDER BY e.createdAt DESC
LIMIT 10;
